name: Trivia Five
description:
Welcome to Trivia Five - The weekly Trivia Quiz Game.

50 Questions

10 Categories

1 High Score

Rounds Include

  1. Multiple Choice
  2. Price Is Right
  3. Catchphrase

New questions and new rounds each week!

A new version is released every Thursday 5pm GMT
